content.rendered:
Directed by Tanuja Chandra.

Written by Tanuja Chandra. Gazal Dhaliwal. Gazal Dhaliwal. Ramashrit Joshi.

Cast Irrfan Khan(Yogendra ‘Yogi’ Kumar Devendra Nath Prajapati). Parvathy Thiruvothu(Jaya Shashidharan). Neha Dhupia(Anjali). Isha Sharvani(Gauri). Pushtii Shakti(Radha). Anud Singh Dhaka(DJ Chintu).Bajrangbali Singh. Ramashrit Joshi(Writer). Bobby Arora(Fellow Passenger). Luke Kenny(Sidkong Sharma). Rishabh Kumar(Krish). Adil Lokhandwala(Bookkeeper). Navneet Nishan(Mrs. Saluja). Shreyas Sanghavi(Amit). Salim M. Shaikh(Medical Shop Owner). Aman Sharma(Salil – Taxi Driver). Nidhi Joshi(Meghna). Avneet Kaur(Teen girl). Hariharasudhan Balasubramani(Dillu).Sapna Basoya. Brijendra Kala(Hotel Manager). Siddharth Menon(Jaya’s Younger Brother). Scott Milburn(Insurance Office Worker)

Language Hindi.

Producers Muhitt Agarwaal. Rakesh Bhagwani. Shailja Kejriwal. Kapil Madnani. Ajay Rai. Vinay G. Rai. Rahul Rawat. Vikas Sharma. Yogiraj Shetty. Sutapa Sikdar. Ajay R. Yadav.

Production Zee Studios. Jar Pictures.
